
{{alias}}
    Regular expression to test if a string is an extended-length path.

    Extended-length paths are Windows paths which begin with `\\?\`.

    Examples
    --------
    > var path = '\\\\?\\C:\\foo\\bar';
    > var bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = '\\\\?\\UNC\\server\\share';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    true
    > path = 'C:\\foo\\bar';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '/c/foo/bar';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false
    > path = '/foo/bar';
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( path )
    false

    See Also
    --------
